linuxfornetworkingprofessionals.description_text:
Key Features

  • Learn how to solve critical networking problems using real-world examples
  • Configure common networking services step by step in an enterprise environment
  • Discover how to build infrastructure with an eye toward defense against common attacks

Who this book is for

This book is for IT and Windows professionals and admins looking for guidance in managing Linux-based networks. Basic knowledge of networking is necessary to get started with this book.

pythonforsecurityandnetworking.human_name: Python for Security and Networking, Third Edition
pythonforsecurityandnetworking.description_text:
Key Features

  • Discover security techniques to protect your network and systems using Python
  • Create scripts in Python to automate security and pentesting tasks
  • Analyze traffic in a network and extract information using Python

Who this book is for

This Python book is for network engineers, system administrators, and other security professionals looking to overcome common networking and security issues using Python. You will also find this book useful if you're an experienced programmer looking to explore Python’s full range of capabilities. A basic understanding of general programming structures as well as familiarity with the Python programming language is a prerequisite.

mastering5gnetworkdesignimplementationan.human_name: Mastering 5G Network Design, Implementation, and Operations
mastering5gnetworkdesignimplementationan.description_text:
Key Features

  • Gain a comprehensive understanding of the 5G end-to-end network architecture
  • Build a foundation to successfully design, implement, manage, and monetize a 5G network
  • Design and deploy innovative applications based on 5G networks

Who this book is for

If you are a telecom enthusiast or work in this domain and are looking to learn more about building a 5G network bottom–up or an application modernization strategy maker, then this book is for you. It provides a consumable understanding of the technology to network engineers, network architects, and infrastructure decision-makers, helping them excel in their day-to-day work involving 5G technology.

networkautomationwithnautobot.description_text:
Key Features

  • Learn how documenting your network in Nautobot can accelerate your network automation journey
  • Apply NetDevOps to your network by leveraging Nautobot as a network source of truth
  • Minimize tool sprawl by extending, using, or building Nautobot Apps
  • Purchase of the print or Kindle book includes a free PDF eBook

Who this book is for

This book is for network engineers, network automation engineers, and software engineers looking to support their network teams by building custom Nautobot Apps. A basic understanding of networking (e.g. CCNA) and knowledge of the fundamentals of Linux, Python programming, Jinja2, YAML, and JSON are needed to get the most out of this book.

zabbix7itinfrastructuremonitoringcookboo.human_name: Zabbix 7 IT Infrastructure Monitoring Cookbook, Third Edition
zabbix7itinfrastructuremonitoringcookboo.description_text:
Key Features

  • Master the redesigned frontend of Zabbix 7 with improved navigation and a streamlined menu structure
  • Automate alert workflows by integrating Zabbix with external services like Slack, Microsoft Teams, and OpsGenie
  • Perform professional IT infrastructure and application monitoring across multiple platforms
  • Purchase of the print or Kindle book includes a free PDF eBook

Who this book is for

This book is for network and IT engineers who want to get started with Zabbix as well as those with an intermediate-level understanding of Zabbix looking to extend their knowledge. While prior experience with Zabbix is not a prerequisite, it will help you make the most of this book.

networkautomationwithgo.description_text:
Key Features

  • A comprehensive guide to the world of modern network automation
  • Use Go to build anything from repetitive task automation to complex distributed systems
  • Over 30 practical, ready-to-use sample programs

Who this book is for

This book is for all network engineers, administrators, and other network practitioners looking to understand what network automation is and how the Go programming language can help develop network automation solutions. As the first part of the book offers a comprehensive overview of Go’s main features, this book is suitable for beginners with a solid grasp on programming basics.

hands-onnetworkprogramingwithc.description_text:
Key Features

  • Apply your C and C++ programming skills to build powerful network applications
  • Get to grips with a variety of network protocols that allow you to load web pages, send emails, and do much more
  • Write portable network code for Windows, Linux, and macOS

Who this book is for

If you're a developer or a system administrator who wants to get started with network programming, this book is for you. Basic knowledge of C programming is assumed.

implementingandadministeringciscosolutio.human_name: Implementing and Administering Cisco Solutions: 200-301 CCNA Exam Guide
implementingandadministeringciscosolutio.description_text:
Key Features

  • Secure your future in network engineering with this intensive boot camp-style certification guide
  • Gain knowledge of the latest trends in Cisco networking and security and boost your career prospects
  • Design and implement a wide range of networking technologies and services using Cisco solutions

Who this book is for

This guide is for IT professionals looking to boost their network engineering and security administration career prospects. If you want to gain a Cisco CCNA certification and start a career as a network security professional, you’ll find this book useful. Although no knowledge about Cisco technologies is expected, a basic understanding of industry-level network fundamentals will help you grasp the topics covered easily.

googlecloudcertifiedprofessionalcloudnet.human_name: Google Cloud Certified Professional Cloud Network Engineer Guide.
googlecloudcertifiedprofessionalcloudnet.description_text:
Key Features

  • Gain hands-on experience in implementing VPCs, hybrid connectivity, network services, and security
  • Establish a secure network architecture by learning security best practices
  • Leverage this comprehensive guide to gain Professional Cloud Network Engineer certification

Who this book is for

This Google Cloud certification book is for cloud network engineers, cloud architects, cloud engineers, administrators, and anyone who is looking to design, implement, and manage network architectures in Google Cloud Platform. You can use this book as a guide for passing the Professional Cloud Network Engineer certification exam. You need to have at least a year of experience in Google Cloud, basic enterprise-level network design experience, and a fundamental understanding of Cloud Shell to get started with this book.

comptianetworkplusn10-008certificationgu.human_name: CompTIA Network+ N10-008 Certification Guide - Second Edition
comptianetworkplusn10-008certificationgu.description_text:
Key Features

  • A step-by-step guide to gaining a clear understanding of the Network+ certification
  • Learn about network architecture, protocols, security, and network troubleshooting
  • Confidently ace the N10-008 exam with the help of 200+ practice test questions and answers

Who this book is for

This book is for students, network administrators, network engineers, NOC engineers, systems administrators, cybersecurity professionals, and enthusiasts. No prior knowledge in networking is required to get started with this book.

networkingfundamentals_packt.description_text:
Key Features

  • Build a strong foundation in networking concepts
  • Explore both the hardware and software aspects of networking
  • Prepare by taking mock tests with up-to-date exam questions

Who this book is for

If you’re new to the IT industry or simply want to gain a thorough understanding of networking, this book is for you. A basic understanding of the Windows operating system and your network environment will be helpful.

segmentroutinginmplsnetworks.description_text:
Key Features

  • Carry out practical labs to thoroughly grasp and execute MPLS, SR-MPLS, and FRR techniques
  • Master SR-MPLS and LDP interoperability for seamless integration and efficient network operation
  • Implement TI-LFA FRR methods for seamless SR-MPLS deployment in production
  • Purchase of the print or Kindle book includes a free PDF eBook

Who this book is for

This book is for MPLS professionals and network engineers looking to deepen their knowledge in SR and TI-LFA. A basic understanding of MPLS networks is a prerequisite, but worry not—the book also covers foundational MPLS concepts, ensuring network enthusiasts can follow along without any problem. This book is specifically designed for network engineering, operations, and design professionals, covering advanced techniques such as TI-LFA for path protection, empowering you to evolve MPLS networks with SR-MPLS seamlessly.

pythonnetworkprogrammingtechniques.description_text:
Key Features

  • Explore different Python packages to automate your infrastructure
  • Leverage AWS APIs and the Python library Boto3 to administer your public cloud network efficiently
  • Get started with infrastructure automation by enhancing your network programming knowledge

Who this book is for

This book is for network engineers who want to make the most of Python to automate their infrastructure. A basic understanding of Python programming and common networking principles is necessary.

make_a_wish.description_text:
Donations to support Make-A-Wish are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Make-A-Wish® creates life-changing wishes for children with critical illnesses. We seek to bring every eligible child's wish to life because a wish is an integral part of a child's treatment journey. Research shows children who have wishes granted can build the physical and emotional strength they need to fight their illness. Headquartered in Phoenix, Arizona, Make-A-Wish is the world’s leading children’s wish-granting organization, serving children in more than 50 countries worldwide. Together, generous donors, supporters, staff and more than 40,000 volunteers, grant a wish every 17 minutes, on average, somewhere in the world. Since 1980, Make-A-Wish has granted nearly 450,000 wishes to children; more than 30,000 last year alone. For more information about Make-A-Wish International, visit worldwish.org and for more information about Make-A-Wish America, visit wish.org.

designingandimplementingmicrosoftazurene.human_name: Designing and Implementing Microsoft Azure Networking Solutions
designingandimplementingmicrosoftazurene.description_text:
Key Features

  • Create and deploy a secure Azure network and implement dynamic routing and hybrid connectivity
  • Master Azure network design for performance, resilience, scalability, and security
  • Enhance your practical skills with hands-on labs aligned to the AZ-700 Network Engineer certification

Who this book is for

Whether you're an Azure network engineer or a professional looking to enhance your expertise in designing and implementing scalable and secure network solutions, this book is an invaluable resource. A basic understanding of cloud solutions will help you to get the most out of this book.

modernnetworkobservability.description_text:
Key Features

  • Craft a dynamic observability stack with real-world, practical applications
  • Build intuitive dashboards and alerts by collecting and normalizing diverse network data
  • Leverage observability data to strengthen automation strategies for network operations
  • Purchase of the print or Kindle book includes a free PDF eBook

Who this book is for

This book is for all network engineering roles such as network analysts, administrators, architects, security personnel, support staff, and managers working in both on-premises and cloud environments who are tasked with implementing or using network monitoring solutions. Basic programming knowledge in Python and Go, familiarity with networking concepts, and a fundamental understanding of Docker containers for lab scenarios will be required.

comptiaapluspracticetestscore1220-1101an.human_name: CompTIA A+ Practice Tests Core 1 (220-1101) and Core 2 (220-1102)
comptiaapluspracticetestscore1220-1101an.description_text:
Key Features

  • Ensure a comprehensive understanding of each exam domain with in-depth practice
  • Enhance your problem-solving skills by working with real-world scenarios
  • Assess your exam readiness with mock exams for both Core 1 and Core 2
  • Purchase of this book unlocks access to web-based exam prep resources including practice questions, flashcards, and exam tips

Who this book is for

Whether you’re a student or a professional, if you’re on a mission to ace the CompTIA A+ exam, this book is for you. This book isn’t meant for teaching theory; instead, it will evaluate your retention of studied information and your exam readiness.

networkarchitectshandbook.description_text:
Key Features

  • Grasp the big picture of information technology infrastructure to become a successful network architect
  • Overcome challenges to improve network performance and configuration management
  • Advance your career by improving your skills using real-life examples and practical advice from an industry expert
  • Purchase of the print or Kindle book includes a free PDF eBook

Who this book is for

This book is for network engineers and technicians aspiring to transition into the role of a network architect. Whether you are at the beginning of your journey or seeking guidance along the path, this book will support you with its deep coverage of key aspects such as design concepts, architectural requirements, relevant experience, certifications, and advanced education with a special emphasis on cloud best practices. A practical understanding of IT networking is necessary to get the most out of this book.

advancednetworksimulationssimplified.description_text:
Key Features

  • Explore network simulation for development, testing, and evaluation activities
  • Understand the key building blocks of simulation and evaluate network topologies
  • Learn how to set up and evaluate wired, Wi-Fi (802.11a/b/g/n/ac/ax), and 4G LTE networks

Who this book is for

This book is primarily for network engineers, networking researchers, and undergraduates. Postgraduate students, researchers, and professors interested in network simulations will also find this book useful. A basic understanding of network simulation technology will be helpful in grasping the topics present in this book.

masteringpythonnetworking_fourthedition.description_text:
Key Features

  • Leverage Python's powerful libraries and frameworks to build production-ready network automation solutions efficiently and effectively
  • Implement network security, monitoring, and management solutions using modern DevOps tools and cloud-native approaches
  • Utilize AsyncIO and cloud capabilities in Python 3 for AWS and Azure network solutions

Who this book is for

Mastering Python Networking, Fourth edition is for network engineers, developers, and SREs who want to learn Python for network automation, programmability, monitoring, cloud, and data analysis. Network engineers who want to transition from manual to automation-based networks using the latest DevOps tools will also get a lot of useful information from this book.

Basic familiarity with Python programming and networking-related concepts such as Transmission Control Protocol/Internet Protocol (TCP/IP) will be helpful in getting the most out of this book.

awscertifiedadvancednetworking_specialty.human_name: AWS Certified Advanced Networking - Specialty (ANS-C01) Certification Guide
awscertifiedadvancednetworking_specialty.description_text:
Key Features

  • Get a thorough understanding of the latest AWS ANS-C01 exam objectives
  • Explore AWS networking options, services, features, and their relationships
  • Prepare for exam success with mock exams that correctly reflect exam-level difficulty

Who this book is for

This book is for professional networkers who want to achieve certification in AWS cloud networking. Anyone currently working as a network engineer or architect, as well as individuals looking to transition into AWS networking will also find this book valuable. A foundational understanding of basic network concepts and an in-depth knowledge of the cloud service connectivity model, specifically the distinctions between IaaS, PaaS, and SaaS services.

make_a_wish.description_text:
Donations to support Make-A-Wish are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Make-A-Wish® creates life-changing wishes for children with critical illnesses. We seek to bring every eligible child's wish to life because a wish is an integral part of a child's treatment journey. Research shows children who have wishes granted can build the physical and emotional strength they need to fight their illness. Headquartered in Phoenix, Arizona, Make-A-Wish is the world’s leading children’s wish-granting organization, serving children in more than 50 countries worldwide. Together, generous donors, supporters, staff and more than 40,000 volunteers, grant a wish every 17 minutes, on average, somewhere in the world. Since 1980, Make-A-Wish has granted nearly 450,000 wishes to children; more than 30,000 last year alone. For more information about Make-A-Wish International, visit worldwish.org and for more information about Make-A-Wish America, visit wish.org.

from_bundle.short_marketing_blurb: Connecting your present to your future
from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get Networking Fundamentals, Network Architect's Handbook, Network Automation with Nautobot, Mastering Python Networking, Fourth Edition, and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb: Become a networking mastermind and lock in the skills and knowledge you need to succeed with our latest Humble Tech Book Bundle by Packt. Inside this 20 lesson networking library, you’ll gain expert insights from hot courses like Network Automation with Nautobot, Network Architect's Handbook, Designing and Implementing Microsoft Azure Networking Solutions, and more! Take control of your future and start a new career in connectivity or polish your existing skills while supporting Make-A-Wish with your purchase.
from_bundle.author: Packt

solidworkstips.description_text:
SourceCAD - Collected SolidWorks Tips and Tricks is your go-to guide for mastering SolidWorks with nearly 20 expert tips that cover part modeling, assembly, and drawing workspaces. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced user, these practical tips will help you streamline your design process, avoid common pitfalls, and enhance your workflow.

Packed with actionable advice, this eBook is designed to save you time and improve your efficiency in SolidWorks. Learn how to navigate key features and tackle complex tasks with ease, making this resource an essential addition to your design toolkit.

autocadquiz.description_text:
SourceCAD - 100+ AutoCAD Quiz with Answer Key is the perfect resource to test and sharpen your AutoCAD knowledge. Featuring over 100 quizzes covering both 2D and 3D workspaces, this eBook challenges your skills and helps you reinforce key concepts. With detailed answers included, you'll gain deeper insights into your strengths and areas for improvement.

Whether you’re preparing for a certification exam or simply looking to brush up on your AutoCAD skills, this collection of quizzes is an engaging and effective way to learn. Test your proficiency, track your progress, and enhance your expertise with this comprehensive AutoCAD quiz guide.

autocadtipsandtricks.description_text:
SourceCAD - AutoCAD Tips and Tricks is packed with nearly 32 valuable tips, tricks, and workarounds designed to make your AutoCAD experience smoother and more efficient. Whether you're looking to speed up your workflow, discover hidden features, or solve common design challenges, this eBook offers practical solutions for users at all skill levels.

From time-saving shortcuts to clever techniques that tackle everyday problems, this guide is a must-have resource for anyone wanting to maximize their AutoCAD productivity. Unlock the full potential of AutoCAD and take your skills to the next level with these expert tips!

200autocad2dand3dcommands.description_text:
SourceCAD - 200 AutoCAD 2D and 3D Commands is the ultimate guide for AutoCAD users looking to streamline their design process. This eBook contains a curated collection of 200 essential 2D and 3D commands, categorized for quick and easy reference. Whether you’re a beginner or a seasoned professional, this resource will help you boost your productivity and enhance your AutoCAD skills.

Each command is thoughtfully organized, allowing you to navigate through complex workflows with ease. From drawing and editing commands to advanced 3D modeling tools, this eBook provides a comprehensive toolkit to tackle any project efficiently. Perfect for users at all levels, it’s an indispensable companion for mastering AutoCAD.

72practicedrawingandprojects.description_text:
SourceCAD - Practice Drawing & Projects is the perfect resource for honing your AutoCAD skills, featuring nearly 100 practice drawings from both 2D and 3D workspaces. These hands-on projects are designed to challenge and develop your design abilities, whether you're working on simple shapes or complex models.

Ideal for beginners and advanced users alike, this eBook provides a variety of drawing exercises that will help you build confidence, improve your techniques, and enhance your overall AutoCAD proficiency. Dive in and start practicing to take your skills to the next level!

beckercadtrainingguide.description_text:
The BeckerCAD 15 Training Guide is a comprehensive manual detailing the installation, functionality, and usage of BeckerCAD, a CAD (Computer-Aided Design) software for 2D and 3D modeling. It includes:

  • Installation & Setup: System requirements, installation, and uninstallation procedures.
  • Program Control: Starting, quitting, screen settings, menu navigation, and customization.
  • 2D & 3D Modeling: Instructions on drawing, modifying, and managing objects in both 2D and 3D.
  • Advanced Features: Gesture recognition, Python scripting, model explorer, and layer management.
  • Printing & Exporting: Steps to print drawings, export/import data, and work with standard sheets.
  • Problem Resolution: Solutions to common errors and troubleshooting guidance.

It serves as a detailed reference for both beginners and advanced users to navigate BeckerCAD efficiently.

beckercad15_2d.description_text:

- Design and editing in 2D

- Powerful surface and constructions

- Ideal for architecture, electrical engineering, model making etc.

builders, house technicians and other professionals who are required to model precise 2D

objects. This program is compatible with most other CAD programs, such as AutoCAD, and

lets you import and export DWG / DXF _ les. This means that you can start a new project

in BeckerCAD and complete it on another computer using a di_ erent CAD software – or

Perfect for users at all levels, these quizzes offer an engaging way to prepare for exams, practice your skills, or simply challenge yourself. Boost your SolidWorks proficiency and gain confidence in your design abilities with this comprehensive quiz collection.

civil3dcommandsandshortcuts.description_text: Get a comprehensive collection of 100 essential Civil 3D commands and shortcuts in a PDF eBook, designed to help engineers and designers streamline their workflow in Autodesk Civil 3D. This guide provides quick access to key commands, boosting efficiency and productivity in civil design projects.

revitcommandsandshortcuts.description_text: Access a PDF eBook featuring essential Revit commands and shortcuts to enhance your BIM workflow. This guide is designed to help architects, engineers, and designers work faster and more efficiently in Autodesk Revit by providing quick access to key commands and productivity-boosting shortcuts.

electrical engineering and much more.

oceana.description_text:
Donations to support Oceana are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Oceana is the largest international advocacy organization dedicated solely to ocean conservation. Oceana is rebuilding abundant and biodiverse oceans by winning science-based policies in countries that control one-third of the world’s wild fish catch. With more than 225 victories that stop overfishing, habitat destruction, pollution, and the killing of threatened species like turtles and sharks, Oceana’s campaigns are delivering results. A restored ocean means that 1 billion people can enjoy a healthy seafood meal, every day, forever. Together, we can save the oceans and help feed the world. Visit www.oceana.org to learn more.

dimensioningbestpractices.description_text:
SourceCAD - 56 Dimensioning Best Practices is an essential guide for anyone looking to create precise and professional mechanical and architectural drawings. This eBook highlights 56 key best practices that will help you master the art of dimensioning, ensuring accuracy, clarity, and consistency in your designs.

Whether you're a beginner or an experienced designer, these best practices will help you avoid common mistakes and improve the quality of your technical drawings. With clear, practical advice, this guide is a must-have resource for creating high-quality, industry-standard drawings.

With more than 225 victories that stop overfishing, habitat destruction, pollution, and the killing of threatened species like turtles and sharks, Oceana’s campaigns are delivering results. A restored ocean means that 1 billion people can enjoy a healthy seafood meal, every day, forever. Together, we can save the oceans and help feed the world. Visit www.oceana.org to learn more.

basic_data.human_name: Hellboy Expanded Universe 2025
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: Dive deeper into Mike Mignola’s Hellboy with even more escapades of the Right Hand of Doom. Get 30+ comics and graphic novels exploring the rich, dark, hilarious and action-packed world of the demonic superhero, Hellboy. Read red hot Hellboy titles including Hellboy in Love, Hellboy in Mexico, and Hellboy: 25 Years of Covers. Explore the expansive Hellboy Universe and help support World Central Kitchen with your purchase!
basic_data.description:
That's all for you! Dive deeper into Mike Mignola’s Hellboy with even more escapades of the Right Hand of Doom. Get 30+ comics and graphic novels exploring the rich, dark, hilarious and action-packed world of the demonic superhero, Hellboy. Read red hot Hellboy titles including Hellboy in Love, Hellboy in Mexico, and Hellboy: 25 Years of Covers. Explore the expansive Hellboy Universe and help support World Central Kitchen with your purchase!

Pay $1 or more. Normally, the total cost for the comics in this bundle is as much as $627. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $1 purchase.

Read them anywhere. The comics in this bundle are available in PDF format, so they work on your computer, e-readers, iPads, cell phones, and a wide array of mobile devices! Instructions and a list of recommended reading programs can be found here.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the developer and to support a charity of your choice. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

houseoflosthorizons_asarahjewellmystery.human_name: The House of Lost Horizons: A Sarah Jewell Mystery
houseoflosthorizons_asarahjewellmystery.description_text: From the world of Hellboy comes a locked-room murder mystery that puzzles paranormal detective Sarah Jewell and her associate Marie Therése, when a weekend trip on a private island off the coast of Washington goes astray. Trapped by a storm and surrounded by myriad suspects who have gathered for an auction of occult items, the intrepid duo must unravel the supernatural mysteries surrounding the guests in the hopes of uncovering the murderer! But all the while bodies keep piling up, and at any moment Sarah or Marie Therése could be next!   Mike Mignola and Chris Roberson return to the world of Hellboy, accompanied by acclaimed artist Leila del Duca and colorist extraordinaire Michelle Madsen for this collection of the thrilling five-issue series!   Collects The House of Lost Horizons #1-#5.

hellboy_25yearsofcovers.description_text: To commemorate the 25th anniversary of the first issue of Hellboy, this deluxe art collection includes more than 150 full-page cover pieces from Mike Mignola, Richard Corben, Duncan Fegredo, and more! This book is sure to appeal to Mignola fans and comics enthusiasts alike, featuring an introduction by colorist Dave Stewart and a foreword by Mignola himself.

younghellboy_assaultoncastledeath.human_name: Young Hellboy: Assault on Castle Death
younghellboy_assaultoncastledeath.description_text: Returned from their adventures on a secret island, Hellboy and the Professor move with the B.P.R.D. from New Mexico to Connecticut. The relocation is tough on Hellboy: is he just homesick, or have scrambled memories from the island gripped the supernatural whippersnapper? Meanwhile, word of Hellboy's survival has also reached an unknown enemy, who failed to kill him once before but is determined not be foiled again… Join Hellboy creator Mike Mignola and cowriter Thomas Sniegoski, with artist Craig Rousseau and colorist Chris O’Halloran for the second volume of the Young Hellboy series.   Collects Young Hellboy: Assault on Castle Death #1–#4 and bonus material.

frankensteinunderground.description_text: After a fight with Hellboy, Frankenstein's monster escapes the terrible Mexican laboratory where he was imprisoned and discovers strange creatures beneath the desert, where he'll learn some of the greatest secrets of the mystical world in the strangest Hellboy spinoff yet! "It's intimidating as hell to take on an icon like the Frankenstein monster. I'm trying to do something that's true to the origin Mary Shelley created for the creature but also captures a bit of the feel that Boris Karloff brought to the role in the classic Universal films. At the same time I'm throwing the monster into an entirely new environment, so I think the result will be something new. It's an odd one, but ultimately will add an important new wrinkle to the Hellboy/B.P.R.D. world." -- Mike Mignola

hellboyinlove.description_text: Ghosts, ghouls…girlfriends? Love blooms between Hellboy and archaeologist Anastasia Bransfield—when they aren’t busy chasing goblins through the UK, fighting shadow ghosts in Turkey, and investigating archeological dig sites in India, that is! Hellboy creator Mike Mignola is joined by cowriter Christopher Golden and artist Matt Smith, featuring the colors of Chris O’Halloran, for a story of occult adventure and unlikely romance.     This volume collects three stories of Hellboy and Anastasia’s misadventures, plus bonus material! Collects Hellboy in Love #1-#5 and bonus material.

hellboy_themidnightcircus.description_text: Young Hellboy runs away from the B.P.R.D. only to stumble upon a weird and fantastical circus and the few demons from Hell who inhabit it. * Cover and story by Mike Mignola! * Duncan Fegredo returns! * An original graphic novel in hardcover! "In the world of Hellboy; the stony hand that Hellboy uses to clobber opponents is called the Right Hand of Doom. For cartoonist and creator Mike Mignola; his right-hand man for doing Hellboy these days could be considered Duncan Fegredo." —Newsarama

koshcheithedeathless.description_text: Mignola returns to Hell and to the bizarre folklore that's filled some of his greatest books, reuniting with one of his favorite collaborators, Ben Stenbeck (Frankenstein Underground, Witchfinder: In The Service of Angels, Baltimore). This volumes collects the complete six-issue series plus bonus material. Sent to kill Hellboy by the Baba Yaga in Darkness Calls, Koshchei the Deathless hinted at a long and tragic life before being enslaved to the Russian witch. Now Koshchei relives every horrible act on his road to immortality and beyond, with none other than his one time enemy Hellboy himself--in a bar in Hell.

visitor_howandwhyhestayed.human_name: The Visitor: How and Why He Stayed
visitor_howandwhyhestayed.description_text: In 1944 Hellboy was conjured in a ceremony meant to give Hitler the ultimate occult weapon. Fortunately, Professor Trevor Bruttenholm was there to witness, and to guide Hellboy to become the world's greatest paranormal detective. But Bruttenholm wasn't the only witness to Hellboy's arrival. The Visitor: How and Why He Stayed reveals the aliens who monitored Hellboy's arrival on earth, and why the assassin they sent to earth stayed his hand. Collects The Visitor #1-#5 and the Visitor short story from the Hellboy Winter Special 2017. Provides backstory and answers questions about the origin of Hellboy in this fun tale about a myserious visitor who is sent to observe Hellboy!

swordofhyperborea.description_text: Hellboy creator Mike Mignola gives us a new tale from the world of Hellboy, cowritten by Rob Williams and featuring the art of Mignolaverse veteran Laurence Campbell to deliver four fascinating glimpses through time in this stunning hardcover collection!   From the ancient warrior Gall Dennar, to Sir Edward Grey, to the B.P.R.D.’s Agent Howards, the iconic Hyperborean sword from the world of Hellboy has landed in many influential hands. And this has been no accident. Trace the sword’s path through the adventures and encounters that finally brought it to Ragna Rok, at the end of the world, and witness the sword’s journey through history.   Collects The Sword of Hyperborea #1–#4.

hellboyinmexico.description_text: In 1956, Hellboy caravans across Mexico--vampire-hunting with luchadores, finding the Aztec Gods, fighting evil turkeys and Frankenstein's monster, and drinking way too much tequila, in the strangest collection of his adventures yet. Hellboy in Mexico collects Hellboy and the Aztec Mummy, Hellboy Gets Married, and Hellboy and the Coffinman Rematch from Dark Horse Presents; Hellboy and the Coffinman from the Hellboy 20th Anniversary Sampler; Hellboy in Mexico one-shot comic: and the original graphic novel, Hellboy: House of the Living Dead.

sledgehammer44volume1.description_text: A man in a suit of iron drops from an American warplane onto a French battlefield and unleashes a powerful cosmic force on an army of Nazis, their massive war machine, and their most dangerous agent, the deadly Black Flame! Comics superstar Mike Mignola creates an alternative story of a World War II robot.

talesfromtheouterverse.description_text: From the world of Baltimore and Joe Golem: Occult Detective, a new immersion into the mysteries of the Outerverse, from Hellboy creator Mike Mignola! Mythical hero Cojacaru the Skinner returns from the grave, the legendary Golem awakens, and the powerful Wyrder Imogen pursues her foes in this stunning collection of stories from Mike Mignola and Christopher Golden’s world of witches and warriors. Delve deep into the mysteries of some of the greatest heroes to challenge the Outer Dark, and gain a rare glimpse into why they fight–and where it may lead them.   Award-winning writers Mignola and Golden are joined by veteran Outerverse artist Peter Bergting (Joe Golem) and colorist Michelle Madsen (Joe Golem, The Crimson Lotus) in this collection of hair-raising stories.   Collects Cojacaru the Skinner #1-#2, The Golem Walks Among Us! #1-#2, & Imogen of the Wyrding Way one-shot.

riseoftheblackflame.description_text: The B.P.R.D.'s greatest foe was not always a man ... Little English girls are going missing, and the trail leads to a bloodthirsty cult wielding an ancient power of evil--the Cult of the Black Flame. No villain in the history of the Mike Mignola's line of books has caused as much death and destruction as the Black Flame. See what it was like when that power belonged to a secret order of priests hidden in the jungles of Siam. Christopher Mitten (Umbral, Criminal Macabre, Wasteland) joins Mignola and Chris Roberson (Hellboy & the B.P.R.D. 1953, iZombie) to explore an uncharted corner of the Hellboy's fictional world.

hellboyuniversemegabundle.description_text:
Our last Hellboy bundle launched at the end of 2024 and included over $300 worth of Mike Mignola’s comics from the extended Hellboy universe. Purchasing this tier will get you that bundle, plus all the new books in the lower tiers. If you bought that bundle, you can skip this tier and everything in the $18, $10, and $1 tiers is all new content.

There are 31 books in this tier.

Lobster Johnson Volume 2: The Burning Hand
Lobster Johnson Volume 3: Satan Smells a Rat
Lobster Johnson Volume 4: Get the Lobster
Lobster Johnson Volume 5: The Pirate's Ghost and Metal Monsters of Midtown
Lobster Johnson Volume 6: A Chain Forged in Life
Lobster Johnson: The Satan Factory

frankenstein_newworld.description_text: Safely tucked away inside the hollow earth where humanity survived after Ragna Rok, precocious young Lilja receives visions of a new darkness taking root on the surface. Defying her elders, Lilja awakens the timeless oracle—once known as Frankenstein—to investigate the warnings and, perhaps, even explore the new world above. Frankenstein: New World, from Mike Mignola, Thomas Sniegoski, Christopher Golden, artist Peter Bergting, and colorist Michelle Madsen, explores a new chapter in the world of Hellboy! Collects Frankenstein: New World #1–#4.

panya_themummyscurse.description_text: Thousands of years before Hellboy, the B.P.R.D., and Ragna Rok, there was Panya. As a girl in ancient Egypt, she witnessed the fall of a dynasty and was gifted—or cursed—with abilities. As she ages, Panya aids those she passes as she journeys to seek out a mysterious light… Mike Mignola and Chris Roberson join creative forces with artist Christopher Mitten and colorist Michelle Madsen to bring Panya’s story to life. Collects Panya: The Mummy's Curse #1–#4 and bonus material.

hellboy_thesilverlanternclub.description_text: Hellboy learns firsthand about the history of the famed Silver Lantern Club! His uncle and former member Simon Bruttenholm relates tales from his time with the Silver Lantern Club, which included Sir Edward Grey, Sarah Jewell, Lady Bai, and Major Singh, as they investigated the mysterious happenings in London near the end of the 19th century!   Mike Mignola and Chris Roberson expand the Hellboy universe with a new tale of strange spiritual happenings. They’re joined by artists Ben Stenbeck and Christopher Mitten, with colors by Dave Stewart.   Collects Hellboy: The Silver Lantern Club #1–#5.

rasputin_thevoiceofthedragon.human_name: Rasputin: The Voice of the Dragon
rasputin_thevoiceofthedragon.description_text: With the World War II raging, Hellboy's future guardian Trevor Bruttenholm enlists with Britain's Military Intelligence, where he uncovers a collection of strange messages. Believing it to be an occult language, he follows his hunch and is thrown into a world of animated corpses, deadly mystics, and Nazi agents. The treacherous journey leads him face to face with the man who will bring Hellboy to Earth--Rasputin! The two men responsible for Hellboy face off!

giantrobothellboy_issue2.description_text: While Hellboy's robotic counterpart battles giant monsters on a faraway island, the scientists running the mission scramble when things at the lab get more than a little out of hand. Inspired by Mignola's viral-hit pencil drawings from Mike Mignola: The Quarantine Sketchbook, Giant Robot Hellboy gets his own story in this 3-part miniseries from Mignola and longtime Hellboy artist Duncan Fegredo!

giantrobothellboy_issue3.description_text: Giant Robot Hellboy goes rogue, leaving both the island and the laboratory in explosive chaos! Inspired by Mignola's viral-hit pencil drawings from Mike Mignola: The Quarantine Sketchbook, Giant Robot Hellboy gets his own story in this 3-part miniseries from Mignola and longtime Hellboy artist Duncan Fegredo!

giantrobothellboy_issue1.description_text: Hellboy is kidnapped and hooked up to a massive mecha-Hellboy for a mission on a mysterious, faraway island, but the island might just put up a fight of its own. Inspired by Mignola's viral-hit pencil drawings from Mike Mignola: The Quarantine Sketchbook, Giant Robot Hellboy gets his own story in this 3-part miniseries from Mignola and longtime Hellboy artist Duncan Fegredo!

worldcentralkitchen.description_text:
Donations to support World Central Kitchen are made to the PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

World Central Kitchen (WCK) is a non-profit organization addressing food insecurity during and after natural disasters and humanitarian crises, while also operating long-term programs aimed at improving livelihoods by strengthening local food ecosystems. Founded in 2010 by Chef Jose Andres following the devastating earthquake in Haiti, WCK has since served more than 8 million meals to those affected by disasters.

hellboy_intothesilentsea.description_text: Hellboy sets sail from the wreckage of a deserted island only to cross paths with a ghost ship. Taken captive by the phantom crew that plans to sell him to the circus, Hellboy is dragged along by a captain who will stop at nothing in pursuit of a powerful sea creature. Following the events of Hellboy: The Island, Gary Gianni draws Hellboy in an original graphic novel. "The master of modern horror comics."-IGN "... Mignola's simple but elegant panel design should be studied by everyone who is or who wants to be a cartoonist. The script is a delight, too, as Hellboy's down-to-earth anger and everyman astonishment remains funny and refreshing." -Publishers Weekly

britishparanormalsociety_timeoutofmind.human_name: British Paranormal Society: Time Out of Mind
britishparanormalsociety_timeoutofmind.description_text: British Paranormal Society members Simon Bruttenholm and Honora Grant arrive at Noxton together, but with separate goals: Honora hopes to uncover information on the town’s strange traditions, while Simon is searching for his missing assistant. But their separate investigations lead down the same twisted path that hides a dark secret behind Noxton’s innocent façade! Mike Mignola and Chris Roberson expand the Hellboy universe with a spooky new tale featuring art by Andrea Mutti with colors by Lee Loughridge, collected for the first time in hardcover. Collects British Paranormal Society: Time Out of Mind #1–#5.

koshcheiinhell.description_text: The world above may be over, and Hellboy gone with it, but Koshchei is still in Hell content with his wine and his books—until an old face arrives and brings Koshchei a critical task. An old and powerful foe is returning, and Koshchei must take up his sword and defend the city from destruction. Mignola returns to Hell to reunite with one of his favorite collaborators, Ben Stenbeck (Frankenstein Underground, Witchfinder: In The Service of Angels, Baltimore, Koshchei the Deathless). Collects Koshchei in Hell #1-#4, Sir Edward Grey: Acheron one-shot, and bonus material.

worldcentralkitchen.description_text:
Donations to support World Central Kitchen are made to the PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

World Central Kitchen (WCK) is a non-profit organization addressing food insecurity during and after natural disasters and humanitarian crises, while also operating long-term programs aimed at improving livelihoods by strengthening local food ecosystems. Founded in 2010 by Chef Jose Andres following the devastating earthquake in Haiti, WCK has since served more than 8 million meals to those affected by disasters.

from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get Crimson Lotus, Hellboy in Love, Giant Robot Hellboy #1, and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb: Dive deeper into Mike Mignola’s Hellboy with even more escapades of the Right Hand of Doom. Get 30+ comics and graphic novels exploring the rich, dark, hilarious and action-packed world of the demonic superhero, Hellboy. Read red hot Hellboy titles including Hellboy in Love, Hellboy in Mexico, and Hellboy: 25 Years of Covers. Explore the expansive Hellboy Universe and help support World Central Kitchen with your purchase!
from_bundle.author: Dark Horse Comics

basic_data.human_name: Train Sim World® 5: Route Remix Bundle
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: Jump into the conductor seat of the most realistic train simulator around with the new Train Sim World® 5: Route Remix Bundle. Gain access to new routes, new cosmetics, and new trains to keep the fun truckin’ along. This value-packed bundle starts with the Train Sim World® 5: Starter Pack, and includes the captivating DLCs Antelope Valley Line and Cajon Pass, and so much more. Pay what you want for the ultimate train sim experience, and help support Calm with your purchase!
basic_data.short_marketing_blurb: Feel the power of a locomotive

trainsimworld5_railpoolbr193vectronlocoa.human_name: Train Sim World 5: Railpool BR 193 Vectron Loco Add-On
trainsimworld5_railpoolbr193vectronlocoa.callout: Loco add-on: Bolt across Riesa-Dresden in the Railpool BR193 Vectron
trainsimworld5_railpoolbr193vectronlocoa.description_text:
TSW Compatible content released for a previous Train Sim World® - features may remain unchanged from the original release and may not make use of all newer core features.

Venture on all-new heavy freight services aboard the most iconic and modern locomotive to grace European rails in the 21st Century – the famous and popular Siemens Vectron rolls into Train Sim World®, sporting the azure accents of Railpool for drop-in cargo leasing duty!

Evolved from the previous EuroSprinter family and entering service in the early 2010s, the Siemens’ Vectron family of locomotives were designed as a modular platform to suit the needs of any rail operator in Europe, available in both DC and AC electric, diesel and dual mode options.

Collectively to date, over 2000 Vectrons have been ordered for use by more than 50 different companies across at least 20 countries. This makes the family a well-known and familiar sight for all railfans, even if design specifications differ, everyone knows the Vectron!

Taking the reigns as the most popular type, the Multi-System (MS) Vectron is designed to work across multiple country borders, fitted with different pantographs and electrical equipment for alternative voltages and signalling systems.

Railpool, a leasing group based in Germany, was the first company to order the Vectron, and now has over 100 on order, mainly of the MS variety, to suit the needs of any operator that may need to lease motive power for heavy-duty service. Take charge of this state-of-the-art locomotive on freight services throughout Europe.

On point of bulky goods traffic, hauled in the spacious VTG Eanos wagon, stay on time and navigate the complex rail network of Dresden, weaving between the busy passenger timetable. Without Dresden-Riesa, embark on your own freight trips across Europe with Scenario Planner and Free Roam.

Nary a gradient will stand in the way of the mighty Railpool BR 193 Vectron, ready for silver service in Train Sim World®!

Please Note: For the full experience, we recommend you own Train Sim World®: Nahverkehr Dresden - Riesa which is available as a separate purchase.

Key Features

  • BR 193 Siemens Vectron locomotive in Railpool livery
  • Eanos Wagon in VTG livery
  • Step into the highly detailed, feature-rich, footplate of this modern locomotive
  • Feel the powerful, true-to-life performance of Siemens’ state-of-the-art platform
  • Learn to drive Vectron with accessible Tutorials on the Training Center
  • Drive challenging freight trains across Scenarios and a Timetable Layer for Nahverkehr Dresden - Riesa
  • Livery Designer and Scenario Planner compatible. Share your creations with the Creators Club
  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology
  • Download size: 161.5 MB

trainsimworld5_railheadtreatmenttrainadd.human_name: Train Sim World 5: Rail Head Treatment Train Add-On
trainsimworld5_railheadtreatmenttrainadd.callout: Loco add-on: 2 powerwashing locomotives = metric tons of fun!
trainsimworld5_railheadtreatmenttrainadd.description_text:
TSW Compatible content released for a previous Train Sim World® - features may remain unchanged from the original release and may not make use of all newer core features.

Water tanks full, 2 locomotives raring to go, it’s Autumn and the tracks need a good blasting - power wash your way to success with the Train Sim World® Rail Head Treatment Train!

Right through the year, the railway network faces many challenges; hot rails in Summer run the risk of buckling, in the Winter they get frozen, point work fails, electrical contact gets difficult. But when the leaves start falling, the Rail Head Treatment Trains (RHTTs) go out on patrol.

How does the RHTT help? It is designed specifically for cleaning the track. Crushed leaves and moisture leave a slippery film on top of rails, and this specialist equipment, in the form of high-pressure water jets cut the residue right off, leaving them in better condition to run normal traffic safely.

These wagons are often hauled by versatile diesel locomotives, such as the Class 66, and these locomotives get dirty! Wet dust and debris coat locos in a muddy layer, but all in the name of reliability. Slotted throughout timetables in Autumn multiple times a day, these trains are a common sight almost anywhere in the UK.

The RHTT in Train Sim World® features 4 wagon variants, with different equipment loaded on each, alongside a weathered Class 66, ready to run on Southeastern Highspeed in-between the busy passenger services. With Scenario Planner, take the leaf blasting action to whichever route you like!

Key Features

  • Weathered KFA Rail Head Treatment Train (RHTT) Wagon with 4 configurations:
    • Dual Tank with Generator
    • Dual Tank with Pump
    • Single Tank
    • Triple Tank
  • Includes a heavily weathered BR Class 66 in EWS livery, with additional switches to control the RHTT equipment
  • Visual only high-pressure water spraying animation
  • Highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cab
  • True-to-life performance and handling
  • Includes Training Module on the Training Center
  • Includes 3 Scenarios and 16 additional Timetable Services for Southeastern Highspeed
  • Livery Designer, Scenario Planner and Creators Club compatible
  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology
  • Download size: 459.21mb

trainsimworld5_nahverkehrdresden-riesaro.human_name: Train Sim World 5: Nahverkehr Dresden - Riesa Route Add-On
trainsimworld5_nahverkehrdresden-riesaro.callout: Survey Dresden, Germany out of the Dresden hbf homebase!
trainsimworld5_nahverkehrdresden-riesaro.description_text:
TSW Compatible content released for a previous Train Sim World® - features may remain unchanged from the original release and may not make use of all newer core features.

Experience complex operations out of the iconic Dresden Hbf, with passengers converging to make a hustle and bustle mix of S-Bahn, regional, inter-city, and freight traffic. Be in control of modern traction and explore the countryside of Train Sim World®: Nahverkehr Dresden - Riesa.

Dating back to the 1830s, the line between Dresden and Riesa was one of Germany’s first long-distance railways. Today the line’s importance keeps it busy, fast services beat the regional traffic through the use of separate fast and slow lines that each take a different path through the Saxony countryside, and the outskirts of Dresden are served by frequent commuter services.

See different views out the windscreen as you take on the challenges of regional, S-Bahn and freight services with the DB BR 442, BR 143, BR 146.2 BR 363 and MRCE BR 185.5. Drive IC and ICE services with the BR 406 ICE 3M and DB BR 101 (available separately).

Drive trains, ride around as a passenger, complete the route tasks, or simply pick a vantage point and watch the action unfold. Create your own experiences with the Scenario Planner and Livery Designer.

Key Features

  • 83 km (51-mile) route from Dresden Hbf to Riesa Hbf via the fast and slow lines, including Großenhain and the S1 Meißen branch
  • Includes the DB BR 442, BR 143, BR 146.2 and Doppelstock in DB Red livery, MRCE BR 185.5 in MRCE Black livery and the DB BR 363 “V 60“ Diesel Shunter in Deutsche Bundesbahn Blue livery
  • Highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cabs
  • True-to-life performance and handling
  • Accessible Training Modules
  • A variety of Scenarios and an authentic Timetable
  • A selection of Route Tasks to complete
  • Livery Designer and Scenario Planner compatible. Share your creations with the Creators Club.
  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology
  • Download size: 6.8 GB

trainsimworld5_cajonpass_barstow-sanbern.human_name: Train Sim World 5: Cajon Pass: Barstow - San Bernardino Route Add-On
trainsimworld5_cajonpass_barstow-sanbern.callout: Experience even more of California on the Cajon Pass; Barstow to San Bernadino
trainsimworld5_cajonpass_barstow-sanbern.description_text:
TSW Compatible content released for a previous Train Sim World® - features may remain unchanged from the original release and may not make use of all newer core features.

Experience the challenge of hauling a nation’s freight industry on the back of your 4000-horsepower shoulders. Tackle stunning mountain ranges and blinding deserts as you tote tonnage through the winding curves of California with Train Sim World®: Cajon Pass.

Climb aboard the masterclass in design that is the ES44C4, a state-of-the-art diesel electric locomotive capable of incredible tractive effort. Operated by BNSF in their hundreds, this beast of a machine makes easy work of any heavy load and is primed to do battle with the fierce grades and harsh conditions of the Cajon Pass.

Sit down in the classic cab of the venerable SD40-2, an all-American hero which is nationwide-renowned for its yesteryear mainline service. Now a veteran, the SD40-2 is kept to secondary duties, as such you will be in charge of local working and switching in yards and industries.

Haul and interact with a wide variety of freight cars along the way. The world revolves on shipping containers, carry these on rails with the Maxi Stack IV cars. Keep the automotive industry turning over by delivering cars in the Autoracks. Fuel up and bear the responsibility of flammables with tanker cars. Deliver a multitude of loads aboard the Boxcars and Bulkhead Flat Cars.

Ride and operate trains in mountains and deserts, complete trackside tasks, or simply go railfanning from your favourite vantage point. Customise your own experiences with the Scenario Planner and Livery Designer and share them on Creators Club.

Key Features

  • 85-mile (136 km) route from Barstow, California to San Bernardino, California
  • ES44C4 in BNSF livery
  • SD40-2 in BNSF livery
  • Autorack, Tank Car, Boxcar, Maxi Stack IV and Bulkhead Flat Car rolling stock
  • Highly detailed, feature-rich driving cabs
  • True-to-life performance and handling
  • Accessible Training Modules, X Scenarios and an extensive 24-hour Timetable
  • Journey Mode tying together Training, Scenarios and Timetabled Services
  • A selection of Route Tasks to complete
  • Livery Designer and Scenario Planner compatible. Share your creations with the Creators Club
  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology
  • Download size: 8.3 GB

trainsimworld5_antelopevalleyline_losang.human_name: Train Sim World 5: Antelope Valley Line: Los Angeles - Lancaster Route Add-On
trainsimworld5_antelopevalleyline_losang.callout: Explore California through the city sprawl of Los Angeles to the Deserts of Lancaster in style with the Metrolink F125!
trainsimworld5_antelopevalleyline_losang.description_text:
TSW Compatible content released for a previous Train Sim World® - features may remain unchanged from the original release and may not make use of all newer core features.

Run to the hills and experience the hefty power of modern American diesel! Tackle the tough terrain of Californian canyons with the Antelope Valley Line, between the sprawling Los Angeles cityscape and desert bushes of Lancaster in almighty Metrolink traction. West Coast rails are yours to explore in Train Sim World®!

Open the throttle and embark on Metrolink commuter services with their sleek and unique F125 diesel fleet. The F125 “Spirit”, first built in 2015, marked a return to new traction for the American market, being Electro-Motive’s first new passenger equipment in over a decade. Meeting the latest in emissions standards, Metrolink’s message was decidedly green, with the stylish streamlining being inspired by European loco designs.

Turn tail with the twinned Rotem Commuter Cars, complete with a cab car allowing for push-pull operations in the termini of LA Union Station and Lancaster. Double decker in form, and just as bold as the F125, they make for a potent and effective mix for the dense LA suburbs and rural Soledad Canyon.

Experience the challenge of mountain pass railroading combined with the timetable pressures of commuter passenger duties. Tackle the likes of Newhall Pass and wind your way through Los Angeles County while keeping to the schedule – but also take a moment to enjoy the stunning views on long, sun-soaked runs from either the head end or cab car.

Marvel at the stunning Californian scenery, and muscle 285,000 lb of hefty diesel machinery with Train Sim World®: Antelope Valley Line: Los Angeles – Lancaster!

Key Features

  • 75-mile Antelope Valley Line, from LA Union Station to Lancaster, right up to date including Vista Canyon station
  • EMD F125 diesel locomotive in Metrolink livery
  • Hyundai Rotem Commuter Trailers and Cab Car in Metrolink livery
  • Highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cabs
  • True-to-life performance and handling
  • Accessible Tutorials on the Training Center
  • A variety of Scenarios and an authentic Timetable
  • A selection of Route Tasks to complete
  • Livery Designer and Scenario Planner compatible. Share your creations with the Creators Club
  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology
  • Download size: 9.1 GB

trainsimworld5_southeasternhighspeed_lon.human_name: Train Sim World 5: Southeastern Highspeed: London St Pancras  Ashford Intl & Faversham Route Add-On
trainsimworld5_southeasternhighspeed_lon.callout: Take a stunning mix of rails through the UK from London and the Garden of England, now inlcuding Ashford International and Dartford!
trainsimworld5_southeasternhighspeed_lon.description_text:
TSW Compatible content released for a previous Train Sim World® - features may remain unchanged from the original release and may not make use of all newer core features.

Experience the unique and exciting blend of classic main line running and thrilling high-speed commuting, aboard state-of-the-art motive power, in London and the Garden of England with Train Sim World®: Southeastern Highspeed – now including Ashford International and Dartford!

Versatility and modern precision combine in the BR Class 395 EMU, Britain’s fastest train, operating at 140mph to offer commuters domestic high-speed services between London, Ebbsfleet International and Ashford International on the state-of-the-art HS1, as well as being able to operate on Kent’s classic main lines through to Medway and Faversham. Master the TVM430 signalling and power change modes in this sleek masterpiece.

Take charge of classic services on the Chatham Main Line with the reliable BR Class 375/9, running in a variety of formations between Rochester and Faversham. This southern region mainstay has been in service since the turn of the century, continue its next chapter by keeping an eye on the signals and weaving through the Medway Towns.

Get a taste of the 90s with the unmistakable motor whines of the BR Class 465/9, fill in the gaps with additional commuter services on the Chatham Main Line, or go full “Kent Link Networker” on the many trains that stretch between Medway, Gravesend and Dartford. Keep up your precision to stay on schedule.

Trade-in electric pickups and passengers for some hard-working diesel freight haulage in the BR Class 66. Work engineering and aggregate trains in and out of Hoo Junction, reaching across North Kent, without disrupting the bustling passenger timetable.

Ride and drive trains around Kent and London, complete platform and trackside tasks, or simply go trainspotting from your favourite vantage point. Customise your own experiences with the Scenario Planner and Livery Designer and share them on Creators Club.

Key Features

  • 89-mile (143 km) route from London St Pancras to Ashford Intl & Faversham, also including Dartford
  • BR Class 395 EMU in Southeastern Highspeed ‘10th Anniversary‘ and ‘#Trainbow‘ liveries
  • BR Class 375/9 EMU in Southeastern Dark Blue livery
  • BR Class 465/9 EMU in Southeastern Blue Stripe livery
  • BR Class 66 Diesel Locomotive in EWS livery
  • MFA and JNA Wagons
  • Highly detailed, feature-rich driving cabs
  • True-to-life performance and handling
  • Accessible Training Modules, X Scenarios and an extensive 24-hour Timetable
  • Journey Mode tying together Training, Scenarios and Timetabled Services
  • A selection of Route Tasks to complete
  • Livery Designer and Scenario Planner compatible. Share your creations with the Creators Club
  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology
  • Download size: 6.9 GB

trainsimworld5_metrolinkf59phrlocoadd-on.human_name: Train Sim World 5: Metrolink F59PHR Loco Add-On
trainsimworld5_metrolinkf59phrlocoadd-on.callout: Loco add-on: Take on the Antelope Valley or San Bernardino rush with retro power!
trainsimworld5_metrolinkf59phrlocoadd-on.description_text:
A North American classic revs up for Southern California service in Train Sim World 5, as the venerable and robust F59PHR bolsters the roster on Metrolink commuter duties. Take on the Antelope Valley or San Bernardino rush with retro power!

Derived from the GP59 freight locomotive, the F59PH was designed in the 1980s to deliver new passenger diesel equipment to emerging commuter networks. Kitted out with 3000 horsepower and Head End Power, the F59PH was among the top brass of locomotives, making them a clear candidate to work in tandem with modern cars and capable of handling busy schedules.

First settling into service in Toronto, Canada, the early 1990s saw a fleet of locos ordered for Metrolink to embark out of Los Angeles and run across their sprawling Californian network. As years have rolled by, so too has technology, but despite two newer diesel types in traffic today, the F59PH hangs on as the F59PHR – a rebuilt variant which can meet modern emission standards.

As part of their age, the Metrolink F59PHRs still hang onto their classic white undercoat, a stark contrast to the silver sheen of their passenger equipment. The F59PHR comes accompanied with the bombardier bi-level cars in their grey liveries.

Multiply your Metrolink experience on the Antelope Valley or San Bernardino Lines with the F59PHR in Train Sim World 5! Take to the rails of any US route in your collection with Free Roam.

Please Note: For the full experience, we recommend you own Train Sim World 5: Antelope Valley Line which is available as a separate purchase.

Key Features

  • F59PHR locomotive in Metrolink white livery
  • Bi-level cars in Metrolink grey liveries
  • Climb into the highly detailed, feature-rich, cab of this classic locomotive
  • Feel the powerful, true-to-life performance and suspension
  • Learn to drive the F59PHR with accessible Tutorials on the Training Center
  • Operate passenger trains across Scenarios and in the Timetable of Antelope Valley Line
  • Also appears in the San Bernardino Line Timetable
  • Livery Designer, Formation Designer and Scenario Planner compatible. Share your creations with the Creators Club
  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology
  • Download size: 237 MB

trainsimworld5.callout: ALL ABOARD! Train Sim 5: the latest and greatest Sim for rail hobbyists and locomotive enthusiasts alike!
trainsimworld5.description_text:
The Train Sim World 5: Free Starter Pack to get access to the TRAINING CENTER, a tailor-made environment designed to train you up with the fundamentals of loco operations!

Learn the basics of passenger operations with the Class 323 & BR 146, discover the complex controls of the Class 66 loco, and fan the flame of nostalgia by learning how to drive an 8F steam loco.

Navigate the Training Center environment and interact with junctions and switches, perform coupling procedures and more.

Watch additional videos understand operational practices like signalling, as well as how to use in-game tools like Free Roam.

Try your hand at mastering this introductory experience, as well as the in-game tools such as Free Roam & Livery Designer, before discovering your favourite routes.

calm.description_text:
Donations to support Calm are made to PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.
 
Campaign Against Living Miserably is a suicide prevention charity that provides life-saving services for anyone struggling with life. They help people end their misery, not their lives, and work towards ensuring that no one feels like suicide is their only option.

trainsimworld5_santafef7add-on.human_name: Train Sim World 5: Santa Fe F7 Add-On
trainsimworld5_santafef7add-on.callout: Logo add-on: Power through steep grades with All American Southwest muscle!
trainsimworld5_santafef7add-on.description_text:
TSW Compatible content released for a previous Train Sim World® - features may remain unchanged from the original release and may not make use of all newer core features.

Warbonnet beauty! An American legend with perhaps the most famous face in railroading history, reminisce in the stainless-steel days and take on the challenge of mastering steep grades aboard the Train Sim World®: Santa Fe F7!

Built between 1949 and 1953, the F7 locomotive was introduced as the latest example of the F-unit design, going onto being the most successful of the type. Over 2300 F7A units were constructed, with an additional 1400 cabless F7B units for extra tractive effort on heavy trains.

Of the many original buyers, there is perhaps none more iconic than the Atchison, Topeka and Santa Fe Railway – known commonly just as Santa Fe. Under Santa Fe-ownership, the fleet became famous for both passenger and freight operations, including the Super Chief, which it led across the states sporting the bold Red, Yellow and Silver accents of the Warbonnet livery.

Having long fallen out of favour for more modern motive power, as at a mere 1500 horsepower a piece, they’re certainly no match for the likes of the ES44C4, the F7 still manages to look state-of-the-art to this day and makes for a nostalgic sight for any railfan.

In Train Sim World 3, the Santa Fe F7 brings celebratory heritage action to Cajon Pass; from switching to summit conquering, haul manifest freight in warbonnet style and bring a taste of yesteryear to the railfans of California!



Key Features

  • F7A and F7B diesel locomotive in Santa Fe Warbonnet livery

  • Boxcar in Yellow livery

  • Highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cab

  • True-to-life performance and handling

  • Includes Training Module on the Training Center

  • Includes 3 Scenarios and 18 additional Timetable Services for Cajon Pass

  • Livery Designer, Scenario Planner and Creators Club compatible

  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology

  • Download size: 764.92mb

trainsimworld5_thameslinkbrclass700_0emu.human_name: Train Sim World 5: Thameslink BR Class 700/0 EMU Add-On
trainsimworld5_thameslinkbrclass700_0emu.callout: Loco add-on: Tour the Southeast of the UK in the regal fashion
trainsimworld5_thameslinkbrclass700_0emu.description_text:
TSW Compatible content released for a previous Train Sim World® - features may remain unchanged from the original release and may not make use of all newer core features.

Modern commuting doesn’t get any better than this, experience the state-of-the-art Desiro City and crunch capacity through the Medway Towns with the Thameslink BR Class 700/0, ready for Kentish service in Train Sim World®!

The Thameslink Programme, a phrase which is ingrained into the minds of every Southeast commuter, was the radical transformation of travel through the centre of London. The plan? Upgrade and expand the Thameslink network with better connections, as well as a brand-new fleet of rolling stock.

Developed from the existing Desiro UK family, and based on passenger feedback, the Class 700 was born. A revolution in every right, the new Desiro City family brought all-new efficiency, capacity, and frequency to Thameslink’s network. Capable of moving over 1000 passengers each, with a massively increased fleet, it was only natural to expand cross-London destinations.

In May 2018, the classic Southeastern London Charing Cross to Gillingham service was withdrawn and replaced with an all-new Luton to Rainham service, operated by Thameslink. Take on the role of driving the Class 700/0 between Dartford and Rainham, stick to the schedule and provide the bolstered capacity to Kent and Medway.

The centrally seated, capacious cab offers a view unlike any other, complete with modern screens and ergonomic controls for a truly 21st Century driving experience. With scenario planning and livery designing, embark on as many journeys as you please, making full use of the dual-mode AC and DC functionality.

Complete your Southeastern Highspeed collection; the Thameslink BR Class 700/0 is ready for Train Sim World® duty!

Please Note: For the full experience, we recommend you own Train Sim World®: Southeastern Highspeed: London St Pancras - Ashford Intl & Faversham which is available as a separate purchase.

Key Features

  • BR Class 700/0 in GTR Thameslink livery
  • Highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cab with modern screens and controls
  • True-to-life performance and handling with both DC and AC operation
  • Intricately detailed passenger interior including modern PIS displays and open gangways
  • Accessible Tutorial on the Training Center
  • Includes 7 Scenarios and Timetable layer for Southeastern Highspeed
  • Journey Mode chapter tying together Training, Scenarios and Timetabled Services
  • Livery Designer and Scenario Planner compatible. Share your creations with the Creators Club
  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology
  • Download size: 216 MB

calm.description_text:
Donations to support Calm are made to PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.
 
Campaign Against Living Miserably is a suicide prevention charity that provides life-saving services for anyone struggling with life. They help people end their misery, not their lives, and work towards ensuring that no one feels like suicide is their only option.

basic_data.human_name: Humble Book Bundle: Robert Jordan's The Wheel of Time
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb:
Enter the world of The Wheel of Time, a fantasy series like no other. Our latest bundle includes every volume of the international bestselling The Wheel of Time and connected titles, a groundbreaking epic fantasy series by Robert Jordan and completed by Brandon Sanderson. The Wheel of Time turns and Ages come and pass, leaving memories that become legend. Legend fades to myth, and even myth is long forgotten when the Age that gave it birth returns again. What was, what will be, and what is, may yet fall under the Shadow.

Since its debut in 1990, The Wheel of Time has captivated millions of readers around the globe with its scope, originality, and compelling characters, and is the basis for the original series on Prime Video. The last six books in series were all instant #1 New York Times bestsellers, and The Eye of the World was named one of America's best-loved novels by PBS's The Great American Read. Robert Jordan's epic saga traces an entire world's struggle to deal with war and destruction while one man prepares to face the embodiment of pure evil.

Enjoy these amazing titles and help support the American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) with your purchase.

newspring.description_text:
The Wheel of Time is now an original series on Prime Video, starring Rosamund Pike as Moiraine!

Since its debut in 1990, The Wheel of Time® by Robert Jordan has captivated millions of readers around the globe with its scope, originality, and compelling characters.

The Wheel of Time turns and Ages come and go, leaving memories that become legend. Legend fades to myth, and even myth is long forgotten when the Age that gave it birth returns again. In the Third Age, an Age of Prophecy, the World and Time themselves hang in the balance. What was, what will be, and what is, may yet fall under the Shadow.

For three days battle has raged in the snow around the great city of Tar Valon. In the city, a Foretelling of the future is uttered. On the slopes of Dragonmount, the immense mountain that looms over the city, is born an infant prophesied to change the world. That child must be found before the forces of the Shadow have an opportunity to kill him.

Moiraine Damodred, a young Accepted soon to be raised to Aes Sedai, and Lan Mandragoran, a soldier fighting in the battle, are set on paths that will bind their lives together. But those paths are filled with complications and dangers, for Moiraine, of the Royal House of Cairhien, whose king has just died, and Lan, considered the uncrowned king of a nation long dead, find their lives threatened by the plots of those seeking power.

New Spring begins Moiraine and Lan's quest to find the Dragon Reborn that will lead to the events of The Eye of the World...and their fateful meeting with Rand al'Thor. New Spring is a perfect jumping-on point for fantasy readers wanting to know more about The Wheel of Time.

knifeofdreams.description_text:
The Wheel of Time is now an original series on Prime Video, starring Rosamund Pike as Moiraine!

In Knife of Dreams, the eleventh novel in Robert Jordan’s #1 New York Times bestselling epic fantasy series, The Wheel of Time®, Tarmon Gai'don, the Last Battle, is upon Rand al'Thor—and now the Dragon Reborn must confront the Dark One as humanity's only hope.

The dead are walking, men die impossible deaths, and it seems as though reality itself has become unstable…

Abandoning Rand’s war against the Dark One, Perrin Aybara has made his own truce with the Seanchan in his obsessive quest to save his wife Faile from the Shaido and destroy their mutual enemies. To achieve victory, Perrin must render the Shaido Wise One channelers in Malden powerless. But even as he puts his desperate plan into action, Masema Dagar, the Prophet of the Dragon, moves against him.

Traveling with circus performers through Seanchan-controlled Altara, Mat Cauthon attempts to court Tuon, the Daughter of the Nine Moons, to complete their fateful prophesized marriage. Despite being surrounded by Seanchan seeking to kill her, Mat’s intended leads him on a merry chase while he wages guerrilla warfare to protect her.

Knowing he cannot defeat the Dark One while at war with the Seanchan, Rand brokers for a truce with the Daughter of the Nine Moons. Unaware of Tuon’s actual location, the Dragon Reborn walks into a trap set by the Forsaken Semirhage, who possesses knowledge about his powers that will either shatter or steel his resolve in the forthcoming conflict.

Since its debut in 1990, The Wheel of Time® by Robert Jordan has captivated millions of readers around the globe with its scope, originality, and compelling characters. The last six books in series were all instant #1 New York Times bestsellers, and The Eye of the World was named one of America's best-loved novels by PBS's The Great American Read.

robertjordan_wheeloftime.description_text:
The Wheel of Time is now an original series on Prime Video, starring Rosamund Pike as Moiraine!

Since its debut in 1990, The Wheel of Time® by Robert Jordan has captivated millions of readers around the globe with its scope, originality, and compelling characters. The World of Robert Jordan's The Wheel of Time is bursting with full-color art, legends, and stories from the iconic series.

In this series companion book, over eighty full color paintings include maps of the world, portraits of the central characters, landscapes, objects of Power, and national flags. The reader will learn about the exotic beasts used by the Seanchan, witness the rise and fall of Artur Hawking, peruse the deeper story of the War of the Shadow, and discover the tale of the founding of the White Tower, and the creation of the Ajahs.

The inner workings of the closed country, Shara, are revealed, as is the existence of a hitherto unknown continent called The Land of the Madmen. This stunning volume also includes double-page spreads of the first seven book jackets by Darrell Sweet so that the art can be enjoyed without type, and all the known maps of the world, including maps of the Seanchan Empire, the nations of the Covenant of the Ten Nations, and the nations as they were when Artur Paendrag Tanreall began his rise to legend.

In a new hardcover edition with a beautiful updated cover, The World of Robert Jordan's The Wheel of Time is a must-buy for devoted fans of the series and newcomers alike.

greathunt.description_text:
The Wheel of Time is now an original series on Prime Video, starring Rosamund Pike as Moiraine!

In The Great Hunt, the second novel in Robert Jordan’s #1 New York Times bestselling epic fantasy series, The Wheel of Time®, Rand al’Thor and his companions set out to retrieve a powerful artifact from The Dark One’s Shadowspawn.

For centuries, gleemen have told the tales of The Great Hunt of the Horn. So many tales about each of the Hunters, and so many Hunters to tell of...

Now the Horn itself is found: the Horn of Valere long thought only legend, the Horn which will raise the dead heroes of the ages.

And it is stolen.

In pursuit of the thieves, Rand al’Thor is determined to keep the Horn out of the grasp of The Dark One. But he has also learned that he is The Dragon Reborn—the Champion of Light destined to stand against the Shadow time and again. It is a duty and a destiny that requires Rand to uncover and master extraordinary capabilities he never imagined he possessed.

Since its debut in 1990, The Wheel of Time® has captivated millions of readers around the globe with its scope, originality, and compelling characters. The last six books in series were all instant #1 New York Times bestsellers, and The Eye of the World was named one of America's best-loved novels by PBS's The Great American Read.
